channel.title: .class files
channel.description:
I decided to get back in my server, but i reinstalled my OS and all of my client files got erased.
I checked my hosting, and it turns out I still have my client .rar file, but with all the .class files, no .java.
I have a very old version of my client on my other computer.
Ive searched google for a .class to .java converter, and put in all the imports it was missing from the other files.
When I was done I compiled and got a shit load of errors.
Can anyone help?

item.title: .class files
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

Decompilers wont get you very far.

Read full topic
